snippet: Crocs, which is expanding its line, has devised an advertising campaign that features the new shoes and says they will be as comfortable as its original clog.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights Croc's campaign for its line of clogs.
lead_paragraph: Crocs, which is expanding its line, has devised an advertising campaign that features the new shoes and says they will be as comfortable as its original clog.

headline.seo: Crocs Expands Line, but Honors Its Clog - Advertising
headline.main: Crocs Campaign Nods to Its Clog
headline.print_headline: Crocs Campaign Nods to Its Clog
